name: Cube Flip
description:
Cube Flip is a relaxing and colorful puzzle game that can be played at calming pace. Game continues to rise in difficulty and number of mechanics increase as you climb up the levels. You will learn from your mistakes and adapt to different mechanics.



Cube flip has a randomized level color feature which lets you change the color combo for the level as many times as you want so you can better your experience with your favorite colors.



With snowy background particles and a calm and relaxing soundtrack cube flip is a short but fun experience.
